page.title: 13Farming
page.content: The majority of land cover of the area is taken up by farmland. There are 16 farms in our block and their land use can be divided into two main categories. One of the categories being crops the other being grassland. The crops tend to be mainly vegetables which vary upon the time of year. The large percentage of the grassland, being used for hay. There is one farm which has land developed for grazing purposes. They only have however, a herd of about 200 sheep. Most of the farms have their own small vehicles-tractors etc.- and large machinery such as combine harvestors or crop spraying helicopters are hired from outside contractors. Most of the farm buildings tend to be quite large comprising of houses, several barns and outbuildings.
